com.tome25.utils.logging

Class TracingFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.logging.Formatter
      • com.tome25.utils.logging.TracingFormatter

  • public class TracingFormatter
extends java.util.logging.Formatter
    A custom formatter for the tracing log style.
